show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
On Today’s Connect the Dots, PRN host, green health journalist, and Huffington reporter Alison Rose Levy... <!--more--> (www.healthjournalistblog.
com and @alisonroselevy) will speak with psychologist Dr Dan Booth Cohen who faciitates a method called Systemic Family Constellations.
The author of the recent book, I Carry Your Heart in My Heart: Family Constellations in Prison, his website is HiddenSolution.
com.
